fields.name: PleaseConfirmEntity
fields.fieldText: Please confirm the following Business Entity details:

fields.name: SelectedEntityDetails
fields.fieldText:
Entity Name: {!vEntity}
Top Level Reporting: {!vReportingL1}
Business Unit: {!vManagedSegment}
Geography: {!vManagedGeorgraphy}

fields.name: ConfirmEntityYesNo
fields.fieldText: Is this the correct Business Entity?

fields.name: ConfirmFinish
fields.fieldText: Confirming "Yes" and clicking Next will create your Risk Review record. You will still have a chance to edit the record before submitting for approval. To make additional changes now click the Previous button below.

fields.name: Are_you_ready_to_create_the_Challenge_Record
fields.fieldText: Are you ready to create the Risk Review record?

fields.name: Please_select_ChallengeRecordType
fields.fieldText: Please select risk review type:

fields.name: Challenge_Title
fields.fieldText: Risk Review Title:
fields.helpText: Please enter a title for your challenge.

fields.name: Challenge_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: Start Date:
fields.helpText: Please enter a date for when the challenge will start.

fields.name: Challenge_End_Date
fields.fieldText: End Date:
fields.helpText: Please enter a date for when the challenge will end.

validationRule.errorMessage: The Challenge End Date cannot be less than the Challenge Start Date. Please correct the Challenge Start/End Dates.

fields.name: Challenge_Status
fields.fieldText: Status:
fields.helpText: The defaul value for a new challenge is "draft". This will be set to another status once you finalize this challenge based on specific business rules.

fields.name: Challenge_Type
fields.fieldText: Sub Type:

fields.name: Challenge_Report_Issue_Date
fields.fieldText: Report Issue Date:

fields.name: KORKIReportingPeriodText
fields.fieldText: Since you selected Operational Risk you must specify a reporting period.

fields.name: Reporting_Quarter
fields.fieldText: Reporting Quarter

fields.name: Reporting_Year
fields.fieldText: Reporting Year

fields.name: KORKI_Question1_text
fields.fieldText:
Operational Risk Key Questions (1 of 5)
Did the Business consider scenario analysis and emerging risks in its operational risk identification process?

fields.name: KORK1_Q1_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: KORKI_Comments_RichText
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: KORKI_Question2_text
fields.fieldText:
Operational Risk Key Questions (2 of 5)
Was there consideration of underlying or supporting key operational risks in a prioritization process?

fields.name: KORK1_Q2_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: KORKI_Comments_RichText_2
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: KORKI_Question3_text
fields.fieldText:
Operational Risk Key Questions (3 of 5)
Where operational risks align to centralized functions (e.g. Technology, Fraud, Third Party, etc.), have other SMEs been involved to comment on the proposed operational risks?

fields.name: KORK1_Q3_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: KORKI_Comments_RichText_3
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: KORKI_Question4_text
fields.fieldText:
Operational Risk Key Questions (4 of 5)
Was a combination of quantitative and qualitative tests applied to ensure that the most significant risks are identified?

fields.name: KORK1_Q4_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: KORKI_Comments_RichText_4
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: KORKI_Question5_text
fields.fieldText:
Operational Risk Key Questions (5 of 5)
Are there remediation actions already in place? If yes, please describe.

fields.name: KORK1_Q5_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: KORKI_Comments_RichText_5
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: Internal_or_External
fields.fieldText: Is the Event Source Internal or External?

fields.name: External_Event_Source_ID
fields.fieldText: External Event Source ID

fields.name: Internal_ID
fields.fieldText: Internal ID

fields.name: Legal_Consultation
fields.fieldText: Legal Consultation:

fields.name: Risk_Type
fields.fieldText: Risk Type:

fields.name: LL_Question1_text
fields.fieldText:
Lessons Learned Key Questions (1 of 5)
Does the information provided in the report adequately support the documented conclusions?

fields.name: LL_Q1_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: LL_Comments_RichText_1
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: LL_Question2_text
fields.fieldText:
Lessons Learned Key Questions (2 of 5)
Were the Businesses and Functional Team impacted by the event engaged in the analysis?

fields.name: LL_Q2_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: LL_Comments_RichText_2
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: LL_Question3_text
fields.fieldText:
Lessons Learned Key Questions (3 of 5)
Was the information gathered to identify the details surrounding the loss sufficient?

fields.name: LL_Q3_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: LL_Comments_RichText_3
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: LL_Question4_text
fields.fieldText:
Lessons Learned Key Questions (4 of 5)
Was a thorough analysis performed?

fields.name: LL_Q4_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: LL_Comments_RichText_4
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: LL_Question5_text
fields.fieldText:
Lessons Learned Key Questions (5 of 5)
Does the Auditor agree with the root cause of the event identified?

fields.name: LL_Q5_Response_yesNo
fields.fieldText: Please answer:

fields.name: LL_Comments_RichText_5
fields.fieldText: Comments:

fields.name: StartingPointText
fields.fieldText: Please use this Flow to create a new Operational Risk Review. Let's get started ...

fields.name: OutcomeDetailsHeader
fields.fieldText: The following details can be added later if need be. If you enter any text now it will be saved with the record.

fields.name: Overall_Observations
fields.fieldText: Overall Observations:

fields.name: Actions_Recommended
fields.fieldText: Actions Recommended:

fields.name: ParticipantTemp
fields.fieldText: Please select participants for this challenge.

fields.name: RecordCreationConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText:
Thank you. Your {!Please_select_ChallengeRecordType} Review has been recroded. The ID is {!vChallengeAutoNumberName}.
Would you like to submit Review {!vChallengeAutoNumberName} for approval now or would you like to return to the record detail and leave the status as DRAFT (you can always submit for approval later)?

fields.name: Submit_y_n_Choice
fields.fieldText: Please select:

value.stringValue: Business agreement to take recommended actions
Business acceptance of risk without taking additional actions
